title: Miss Fortune Updates
body:
Just some changes to make Mf more popular in competitive play.

Q = Unchanged.

W = Passive speed boost only depletes from champion or turret damage. Attack speed bonus lasts longer.

E = If enemy's stay within the area for too long they are snared for 1.00 sec/ 2.00 sec. Deals physical damage to minions and neutral monsters.

R = Miss Fortune can move while casting her ultimate but her movement speed is reduced by 60%/70%/80% or whatever.

That is all :) {{champion:21}}
